import React from 'react' import './CartItem.css' function CartItem({ product, Sort, Size, addToCart }) { return (
{product .sort((a, b) => Sort === "HIGH" ? a.price < b.price ? 1 : -1 : a.price > b.price ? 1 : -1 ) // FIX Me: this is a bug, the filter is not working .filter((item) => item.availableSizes.indexOf(Size) > 0) .map((product) => (

{product.price}

{product.title}

{product.availableSizes.indexOf(Size)}

))}
); } export default CartItem
